author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: Free LEGO Life Magazine Subscription
text:
Have little LEGO fans at home? Head on over to LEGO.com to score a FREE subscription to LEGO Life Magazine â€“ perfect for kiddos ages 5-9. Simply log in to your LEGO account or sign up for a free account here , enter your mailing address and the first issue will arrive within 6-14 weeks.

LEGO Life Magazine is packed full of comics, activities, LEGO fan creations, building tips and more! Your child will receive this FREE magazine five times a year until their 10th birthday.
Do you have kiddos ages 8-12? Be sure to check out the Free LEGO Life App for Kids ! (Thanks, Stephanie!)
